Detailed Description

class XQGLWidget: implements a QGLWidget

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

XQGLWidget::XQGLWidget ( QWidget *  parent = 0  ) 

XQGLWidget constructor; does a lot of initialization to (usually sensible) hardcoded default values, creates the menus and accelerators

Parameters:
parent parent QWidget, defaults to NULL
name name, defaulting to ""
